PFun Glucose Web API — Demo

Please note that the API is currently under active development

Demos

Visualizations, interactive dashboards, etc.

  • (WebSockets) Run-at-time Demo
  • (WebGL) Real-time Streaming Demo

Notebooks
  • Modular CMA Model Demo
  • Visualize Generated Scenarios

API Endpoints

  • View the model parameters schema using the /params/schema endpoint.
  • Get the default model parameters using the /params/default endpoint.

Documentation:

For more information on how to use the API, please refer to the documentation available at:

  • (SwaggerUI) Interactive API Documentation
  • (ReDoc) Readable API Documentation
  • (JSON) OpenAPI Schema
